statements: SELECT * FROM soil_nutrient_levels_table WHERE nitrogen_level > 10
SELECT crop_name, potassium_level FROM soil_nutrient_levels_table WHERE phosphorus_level < 5.0
SELECT id, crop_name, nitrogen_level FROM soil_nutrient_levels_table WHERE potassium_level = 3.0
SELECT * FROM soil_nutrient_levels_table ORDER BY phosphorus_level DESC
SELECT crop_name, nitrogen_level, potassium_level FROM soil_nutrient_levels_table WHERE nitrogen_level <= 15
SELECT * FROM soil_nutrient_levels_table WHERE nitrogen_level > 0.5 ORDER BY potassium_level DESC, phosphorus_level ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT crop_name, nitrogen_level FROM soil_nutrient_levels_table WHERE nitrogen_level <= 0.3 AND phosphorus_level >= 0.2
SELECT id, crop_name, (nitrogen_level + phosphorus_level + potassium_level) AS total_nutrient FROM soil_nutrient_levels_table WHERE crop_name LIKE 'P%'
SELECT * FROM soil_nutrient_levels_table WHERE potassium_level = (SELECT MAX(potassium_level) FROM soil_nutrient_levels_table)
SELECT crop_name, nitrogen_level, potassium_level FROM soil_nutrient_levels_table WHERE nitrogen_level > 0.4 OR potassium_level < 0.2
SELECT * FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels;
SELECT ph_level, nutrient_A FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Fertilizer_Application WHERE fertilizer_type = 'Organic';
SELECT id, fertilizer_quantity FROM Fertilizer_Application ORDER BY fertilizer_quantity DESC;
SELECT id, ph_level FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels WHERE ph_level > 6.5;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels WHERE ph_level > 6.5 ORDER BY nutrient_A DESC;
SELECT id, fertilizer_type FROM Fertilizer_Application WHERE fertilizer_quantity > 100 ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, ph_level, nutrient_A FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels WHERE nutrient_A > 10 AND nutrient_B < 5;
SELECT * FROM Fertilizer_Application WHERE fertilizer_type LIKE '%organic%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, nutrient_B FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels WHERE ph_level < 5.5 ORDER BY nutrient_B ASC;
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientLevels
SELECT Location, NitrogenLevel, PhosphorusLevel, PotassiumLevel FROM SoilNutrientLevels
SELECT Location, NitrogenLevel, PhosphorusLevel, PotassiumLevel FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE NitrogenLevel > 5
SELECT CropName, RecommendedNitrogen, RecommendedPhosphorus, RecommendedPotassium FROM CropDetails
SELECT CropName, RecommendedNitrogen, RecommendedPhosphorus, RecommendedPotassium FROM CropDetails WHERE RecommendedNitrogen < 10
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientLevels
SELECT Location, NitrogenLevel FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE PhosphorusLevel > 2
SELECT CropName, RecommendedNitrogen, RecommendedPhosphorus, RecommendedPotassium FROM CropDetails
SELECT * FROM FertilizerApplication WHERE NitrogenApplied > PhosphorusApplied
SELECT ApplicationId, NitrogenApplied, PotassiumApplied FROM FertilizerApplication ORDER BY PotassiumApplied DESC
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT location, nitrogen_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE potassium_level > 0;
SELECT sample_id, location, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE nitrogen_level < 10 AND phosphorus_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM Crops WHERE optimal_nitrogen_level < 50 AND optimal_phosphorus_level < 30;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name FROM Crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE nitrogen_level > 5 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT sample_id, location, nitrogen_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE phosphorus_level < 3.5 ORDER BY nitrogen_level DESC
SELECT location, potassium_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE sample_id = 3
SELECT * FROM Crops WHERE optimal_nitrogen_level >= 4 AND optimal_phosphorus_level < 2.8 ORDER BY crop_name
SELECT crop_name, optimal_potassium_level FROM Crops WHERE optimal_potassium_level BETWEEN 1.5 AND 2.5 ORDER BY optimal_potassium_level
SELECT * FROM soil_samples ORDER BY nitrogen_level DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, phosphorus_level FROM soil_samples WHERE potassium_level > 0.5;
SELECT sample_id, nitrogen_level, potassium_level FROM soil_samples WHERE location = 'Field A';
SELECT sample_id, location, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level, potassium_level FROM soil_samples WHERE sample_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM soil_test_results WHERE nitrogen_level BETWEEN 1.5 AND 2.5;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples WHERE nitrogen_level > 3.5 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT crop_name, optimal_nitrogen_level, optimal_phosphorus_level FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT s.*, c.crop_name FROM soil_samples s JOIN crops c ON s.sample_id = c.crop_id WHERE s.location = 'Farm A' ORDER BY c.optimal_nitrogen_level DESC;
SELECT r.recommendation_info, f.fertilizer_name FROM fertilizer_recommendations r JOIN fertilizer_types f ON r.fertilizer_id = f.fertilizer_id WHERE r.crop_id = 4;
SELECT t.*, s.location FROM soil_test_results t JOIN soil_samples s ON t.sample_id = s.sample_id WHERE t.nitrogen_level < 2.0 AND t.phosphorus_level > 0.5;
